General.Name: Taiwan Hopax Chemsistry MFG Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Hopax Chemicals Manufacturing Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and sells chemical raw materials for pharmaceutical, industrial, paper making, and office stationery industries. It offers wet end, coating, non-carbon carbon paper, and dispersant chemicals, as well as other papermaking chemicals; chemicals for boiler and cooling water; supply water and water waste treating compounds; microbial fertilizers; and biological buffers, zwitterionic detergents/bio-detergents, additives for electroplating and lithium-ion batteries, electrolytes for lithium-ion batteries, and sulfonate chain modifiers. The company also engages in research and development, production, and sale of medical supplies and biotechnology products. In addition, it is involved in the sale office stationery products; and investment activities. Further, the company provides a range of products under the Stick'n name. Taiwan Hopax Chemicals Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
